##Lengthening the data set
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(devtools)

#Reduces columns to country, year, id, idnum_14, and answer
argentina2 <- argentina %>%
  gather(column_name, answer, estratopri:formatq) %>%
  select(pais, year, idnum, idnum_14, column_name, answer)

#Function for reducing columns
lengthen <- function(country) {
  country <- country %>%
  gather(column_name, answer, estratopri:formatq) %>%
  select(pais, year, idnum, idnum_14, column_name, answer)
}
```
